description: For sale is this 1965 Corvette coupe painted in its original color of Ermine White with a new black vinyl interior. This attractive little coupe was originally delivered to Upper Darby Pa and sold to its first owner in April of 1965 with a 327ci / 365 hp engine with a Muncie 4 speed that had a 4:11 posi-traction rear end putting its power to the rear wheels. Currently there is a NOM but period correct 327 small block long with a Muncie 4 speed transmission and the 4:11 posi rear end. This car is mechanically in great shape with no issues and is fun to drive. The brakes and calipers have just been replaced as have the mufflers. The interior is in like new condition. We have the Warranty book and Pro-tecto Plate and the original AM/FM radio instructions. This is a great mid-year coupe that is fun to drive for under $50000...CALL US..Either Bob or Ted will be happy to answer your questions

Our Detroit Showroom is proud to offer this iconic 1966 Chevrolet Corvette Coupe. This "??66 Vette is powered by a numbers matching 327 cubic-inch V8 engine backed by a 4-speed manual transmission with only 200 miles since they were both completely rebuilt. Options on this 1965 Chevrolet Corvette include AM Radio 4-wheel Disc Brakes Seat Belts a freshly detailed Vinyl Interior and Radial Tires.Here we have a Classic American Muscle car! This car is spectacular and well maintained. This exquisite piece of machinery is ready for car meets or going out and cruising the streets with friends. Whether you"??ve always wanted a C-2 Corvette or you have a collection with a missing piece or you"??re looking for a classic to invest in this 1965 Chevrolet Corvette satisfies all those needs. This original "??66 Vette is powered by the same 327 Cubic-inch heart that was factory installed back in 1966 and she still runs like a dream.  The most impressive part is that this Corvette is sitting on a brand new frame with new suspension components and all new brake system.  The new brake lines were tucked in the frame and everything underneath this Corvette is clean enough to eat off.  If a vintage muscle car is what youre after then look no further. You will certainly have a tough time finding one nicer especially at this low of a price. The car looks phenomenal with its red paint and black vinyl interior you will definitely turn heads while driving around town in this Vette. Take a seat behind the wheel and you feel like you are back in 1966 again. This car is spectacular inside and out and is anxiously waiting to be added to your collection today!This 1966 Chevrolet Corvette for sale is located in our Detroit Showroom and can be seen in greater detail including a High Definition video at www.GatewayClassicCars.com. Please call (313) 982-3100 or email us at
[Email Dealer]
for additional information.

Gateway Classic Cars of Dallas welcomes this 1965 Chevrolet Corvette to its showroom located in DFW Airport TX! Argued to be the finest generation of Corvettes produced the C2 captured the essence of the all-American muscle car fast smooth and sporty.  This 1965 Corvette embodies all those things and is ready for a new chapter!  Check out the black leather interior that pairs beautifully with the subtle burgundy paint that sets this C2 apart from the rest.  Providing the power for this awesome car is a 383 Stroker V8 that roars as you drive down the highway.  Coupled to a rebuilt five-speed manual transmission and a 3.08 rear end you"??ll have no problem getting to where you need to go in fast style.  What can make the appearance of a C2 Corvette even better?  Try some American Racing ® wheels that put this car over the edge! Additional features include Air Conditioning AM/FM Radio and Power Rack and Pinion Steering by Steeroids.  To view this 1965 Chevrolet Corvette in greater detail including HD pictures and an HD video visit www.GatewayClassicCars.com or our Dallas showroom located in DFW Airport TX. For more information please call 817-310-9400 or email
[Email Dealer]

Gateway Classic Cars of Louisville is very proud to offer this very nice 1964 Chevrolet Corvette Coupe. With only 47501 actual miles on the odometer this numbers matching 365 HP 327 Cubic Inch V8 Corvette fires right up. This Corvette is an absolute pleasure to drive anywhere not to mention the double takes and thumbs up you"??ll get. The engine compartment is extremely clean with everything being factory correct. The 4 speed manual transmission shifts smooth and the clutch feels healthy when youre banging through the gears. The rear end has the factory  gears which makes this Corvette a lot of fun to hit the streets with.  The 1964 Corvette saw a few changes over the first C2 that was introduced in 1963. The ride quality was greatly improved with the swap to progressive rate front coil springs as opposed to the prior constant rate springs and the rear leaf thickness was also altered this allowed for far greater handling. Even with the changes made to the suspension for a more comfortable ride the Corvette didnt have to sacrifice its performance this car will carve through corners like you would expect a Corvette to. The Daytona Blue metallic paint is in good shape and is believed to have only been repainted once. The black interior of this Corvette is in excellent shape with no rips tears or cracks in the dash. The factory clock still works so be sure to disconnect the battery or keep a battery tender on it when not in use!  Options on this car include; AM/FM Radio Rally Wheels with Radial Tires Seat Belts Vinyl Interior and Windshield Wipers. To view the beautiful Corvette with HD pictures and to watch a video of this beautiful 1964 Chevrolet Corvette Coupe please visit www.gatewayclassiccars.com. For more information please contact one of our friendly staff at 812-294-1555 or email us at
[Email Dealer]
. For more information please contact one of our friendly staff at 812-294-1555 or email us at

Now for sale in our Houston Showroom is this beautiful 1965 Chevrolet Corvette. 1965 was the year 4-wheel disc brakes were introduced to the C2 Corvette. This car has a very nice Rally Red paint and is in great condition. The car is powered by a rebuilt 327 CID V8 to L79 specs. Listening to it idle is a treat never mind winding it through all four gears. The 4-speed Muncie M20 transmission has been fully rebuilt that spins a set of 3.36 gears (PosiTract) that make it street friendly. Both the engine & the transmission were rebuilt a little over 8k miles ago.  The four-wheel disc brakes are welcoming to the cars performance. This corvette rides on classic period correct wheels that are "??knock-off"? style & wrapped in fairly new 205/70/14 black wall radials. The car has been subjected to an exhaustive cosmetic and mechanical restoration. The fiberglass prep was expertly done with the surfaces sanded to near perfection. The gaps were expertly aligned and the rally red paint was finished with a two-stage urethane. In addition all the chrome was restored the stainless spent time with a buffing wheel and the shiny rocker trim looks new. A bright white convertible top was installed in January 2017. The interior of the car is in great condition and ready for a new owner to get behind the wheel. The black vinyl seats are in like new condition and have very little wear. To see all the HD pictures and video please go to http://gatewayclassiccars.com/houston/1965/chevrolet/corvette-S838.html. For even more information on this 1965 Chevrolet Corvette located in our Houston showroom come by and see us or contact the showroom at (832)243-6220 or email the showroom at
[Email Dealer]

For sale in our Atlanta showroom is this 1963 Chevrolet Corvette. The 1963 Corvette Sting Ray not only had a new design but also newfound handling prowess. The Sting Ray was also a somewhat lighter Corvette so acceleration improved despite unchanged horsepower. For the 1963 model production was divided almost evenly between the convertible and the new coupe - and more than half the convertibles were ordered with the optional lift-off hardtop. Nevertheless the coupe wouldnt sell as well again throughout the Sting Ray years.  New for the 1963 model year was an optional electronic ignition the breakerless magnetic pulse-triggered Delcotronic first offered by Pontiac on some 1963 models. This non-numbers matching 4 speed Corvette would make a good driver or one to restore back to showroom condition.  Red convertible Corvette what else do you need.  The only thing it is missing is you in the driver"??s seat! To view the car in greater detail including 100+ HD photos and HD video please visit www.gatewayclassiccars.com. For more information please call the Atlanta showroom at 678-894-4833 or e-mail us at
[Email Dealer]

For sale at Gateway Classic Cars in our St. Louis showroom is a 1966 Chevrolet Corvette.  This beautiful red 66 is powered by a crate engine 502 cubic inch Big Block and backed by a 4-speed manual transmission.  That is certainly enough power to over whelm the rear tires in most gears.  This one is believed to be an original big block car due to the 6500 RPM redline no documentation to support this.  Covering the 502 is a correct style of Big Block hood for a 1966.  A lot of people tend to replace their hoods with the 1967 Big Block hood this one looks great!  Painted Bright Red with nice chrome Rally Wheels and correct style side pipes this Corvette makes a presence and an unmistakable sound.  Equipment is light as it should be with a Big Block and includes an AM/FM radio with cassette Teak steering wheel and Power windows.  In 1966 4-wheel disc brakes were standard and is how this car is equipped.  The C2 Corvettes are without question the most sought after among all the Corvette generations.  Of the second generations the Big Block cars are the most desirable.  Here is a red Big Block 4-speed with side exhaust.  Look no further and call us now to take this one off the market.  For more information on this 1966 Chevrolet Corvette call 618-271-3000 or stop by our St. Louis showroom.  To view HD photos and video visit www.gatewayclassiccars.com

Featured and up For sale in our Orlando Florida showroom is a great example of a C1 Corvette from 1959. When you think of a C1 the vision of this car comes to mind. Black with White convertible top. This car shows great and you can drive her anywhere and be proud. The engine is a 283  V8 with 4 barrel carb mated to a 4 speed manual transmission. The power is smooth and gets this Corvette moving the way a Corvette should.  This car will really get up and go The sound is intoxicating you just want more and more as your foot gets closer to the floor. The wind in your hair while shifting through the well matched gears never gets old. The interior in black  is just as good as the rest of the car and you get a sense of what the car was like in 1959 when it was new.  This car will be the envy of anyone who sees her.  This is truly a car that has to be seen. If you are looking for an epic Corvette then this C1 is the car for you. The features include AM/ FM  Radio Manual Convertible Top Hub Caps Seat Belts Vinyl Interior and White Wall tires. For more HD pictures and video visit www.gatewayclassiccars.com For more information call our Orlando Florida  showroom at 407-771-2000 or email us at
[Email Dealer]
See more at :  http://www.gatewayclassiccars.com/orlando/1959/chevrolet/corvette-S811.html

For sale in our Houston Showroom is this beautiful 1965 Chevrolet Corvette Sting Ray Convertible. This is one for ages! Upon its arrival in 1963 the second-generation Corvette design had a significant impact on future designs to come. The C2 Corvettes are arguably the best design the Corvette has received since its arrival in 1953. This Gen 2 Corvette has an intimidating stance that instantly draws the eye to its sharp body lines.  This paint color is absolutely stunning and shines bright like a diamond in the sunThis car comes with a certified stated value appraisal that can go with the car. Originality is key with this Corvette and if you are looking for a beautiful drop top Stingray this is your best candidate. With only 34371 ORIGINAL MILES!!  which has been confirmed by a reputable appraiser this car receives extra value above and beyond the norm. The car has a very straight body clean lines & is completely rust free. It runs & drives exceptionally well like driving a new car with very strong power & acceleration. No smoke & sounds exceptional. Has zero vibration while letting out the clutch in takeoff or backing up slowThis Silver Streak has a newly rebuilt 327/350 HP w/period correct Block & New Holley Carb @ 350 HP that runs very smooth & is in excellent condition. It has a great close ratio 4-speed manual transmission that shifts very smoothly up & down through the gears. It has beautiful original hub caps & new tires that help the outstanding smooth & straight driving.Options on this car include; 4-wheel disc power brakes power steering AM/FM Stereo Clock Tach & Cold A/C w/134A Freon conversion. Undercarriage is all original and very good. Overall it"??s a very impressive car & has a combination that"??s given it that "??Look that makes YOU Look!!. 1965 was the first year the Corvette offered disc brakes as a standard option so getting this beast to stop on a dime is a breeze. This rare beauty is sure to please its next owner for many years to come. This vehicle is an absolute head turner and would make an amazing addition to any garage. For more information including HD photos and video of this Vette please visit www.GatewayClassicCars.com or call to speak with one of our knowledgeable and friendly staff at (832) 243-6220.

Gateway Classic Cars of Orlando is proud to feature this stunning 1965 Chevrolet Corvette Stingray Coupe . Decked in a beautiful  Candy  Apple Red paint job this beauty is sight for sore eyes. Powered a 327 CID V8 rated at 365 horsepower and a 5-speed manual transmission this car will get up and go !!Featuring  Big Block Radiator  AMF aluminum heads MSD ignition hooker headers side exhaust   this is the perfect Corvette for a collector looking expand their collection even further. The Candy Apple Red paint is in great shape as is the underside of the vehicle as well as all the chrome. The interior is near spotless with defects being almost nonexistent! This car will really stand out in the crowd. From top to bottom this Corvette is clean and ready to go!While all C-2 Corvettes are increasing in value this one has a few options that set it apart from the others. Significantly adding to its value are the original knockoff wheels with new chrome Spinners  leather interior hard top air conditioning power steering and the wood steering wheel. Based off of its current condition and options it is more than possible that in the near future this Corvette could be worth well over $100000 but only time will tell.Whether you"??ve always wanted a C-2 Corvette or you have a collection with a missing piece or you"??re looking for a classic to invest in this 1965 Chevrolet Corvette satisfies all of those needs. For sale in our Chicago showroom is this little red 1964 Chevrolet Corvette Roadster. The car that is not only an American Icon because of it"??s good looks but also the numbers-matching 327 Cubic Inch V8sitting under the hood.  This roadster makes a great driver or would be a perfect candidate to take to that next level. Imagine jumping into the black bucket seats gripping the wood grain steering wheel grabbing a hold of the Cue Ball Hurst shifter and taking off on the open road. The transmission shifts seamlessly through its 4 Speeds and is great compliment to the roaring V8.  The bright red paint will be gleaming in the sunshine as you cruise around with the top down listening to the growl of that V8. The rally wheels are the perfect accent to this little Stingrays already good looking lines. Options include AM/FM Radio Manual Vinyl Topcolor-matched hard top Radial Tires Rally Wheels Black Vinyl Bucket Seats and Hurst Shifter.  The C-2 Corvettes have maintained popularity over the years and this one is sure to turn some heads.  Located in our Chicago Showroom this 1964 Chevrolet Corvette can be seen including an HD video and pictures at www.gatewayclassiccars.com.  For additional information please call (708) 444-4488 or email
[Email Dealer]

This 1959 Corvette is one striking total package.  Bright two-tone paint and even brighter chrome make quite an impression on the outside.  The V8 power with a four-speed keep you wanting to hop in and go for a drive.  And since this icon is ready to roll right now, what's stopping you from enjoying this symbol of the open road?

This is the year everything really seemed to come together for the Corvette.  The design was a bit sleeker, but it still has the right features from the first 'Vettes, like a hint of tailfin and a genuine trunk. After all, the first-generation Corvette is an icon in all of our hearts, so the little differences are part of the fun of ownership.  And speaking of difference, this one will be distinctive wherever it goes.  The white paint with silver cove inserts showcases an understated flash.  Where the real flair is showcased on this one is in the brightwork.  You can tell there was a nice investment in chrome in all the places that count, including the toothy-grille, two-piece front bumpers, and two-piece rear with integrated exhaust.  And because no Corvette is complete without a touch of red, we love how the color of the steel wheels gives a hint of aggression behind the bright factory wheel covers.

The hint of red on the wheels is also a great preview of the interior.  The dash, carpeting, door panels, and bucket seats all retain a nice cherry hue.  And speaking of the seats, because C1 ownership is all about the details, don't forget to point out the horizontal pleats that were only on the '59s.  There's a healthy dose of brightwork on the door panels, dash, and steering wheel and it's all complete and shining, like a good classic should.  The thin and grippy wheel feels great in your hands, and it gives you a commanding view of the full gauge panel.  And because everything is working (including the important tach in this stick-shift car), there's nothing stopping you from going out and having a Route 66-style adventure.   There's even an upgraded AM/FM stereo with an aux input for the most modern music players, and that makes sure you can hear your favorite tunes while the wind whips through the cabin.  On those days when you don't want the open air experience, a color-matched hardtop and full roll-up windows completely enclose this C1.

The presentation under the hood looks terrific with the silver Corvette script on the valve covers, bright air topper, and bold block and intake color.  This retains the correct 283 cubic-inch displacement, but the V8 is a slightly newer block from the 1960s.  Plus, there has been the right maintenance like newer hoses and an upgraded distributor.  This makes for a motor that fires up nicely and a classic Corvette you can confidently enjoy on the road.   When you do, you'll love the hit of power from the four-barrel carburetor.  Plus, the control of the four-speed manual transmission and the howl of the dual exhaust are an intoxicating symphony for the senses.
The C1 Corvette is an icon, and so rarely will you get a chance at something so beautiful that's also turn-key ready for fun this weekend.  Don't wait, call today!

Of course there is ''custom'', and then there is CUSTOM! This perfect 1966 Corvette IS CUSTOM. An original numbers matching L79-  327 - 350Horsepower and 4 speed transmission is the canvas for this colorful 1966 Corvette. Nosed and decked, all seams glassed and smoothed. Front bumpers removed and holes filled. Customized front grill, and lower valance modified. Third tail light added with sequential flashers. Painted with House of Color Kandy Tangerine, and Gamma Gold. Check out the Sripes and variegated foil that even run in and out of the door jams.

The restored original Corvette interior is perfect. Like new carpeting shows very well. Vintage Air keeps you cool. Precise and powerful is this Custom Kandy Corvette. Strike fear into all as the beast roars through the baffled exhaust. They will hear you coming, and be blinded when you drive by your adoring fans.
